CustomField.description: The default is 2000. The number of files generated will depend on total number of records returned by query as per Metro2_Query_Class__c (or default class) totalRecords/Records_Per_File__c. Very high number can cause CPU or heap issue for the job.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set this to a number which will determine the number of records taken by job for creating a Metro2 file.
CustomField.label: Number of Records per File
